item.title: Pk point shop ~Help~
item.dc:creator: @b4k_2_lumby b4k 2 lumby
item.description:
@b4k_2_lumby wrote:

Ok I did my pk point shop and pk systeam but how do I fix when you click value it hows you need 250 coins even though thats how many pk points you need someone help =O

Heres my code

for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) { TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor( GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); Slot = GetItemSlot(995); Slot2 = GetItemSlot(6529); if (Slot == -1 && MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 19) { sM("You don't have enough coins."); break; } if (amount > 100) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot))*amount; Slot = GetItemSlot(995); if (Slot == -1 && TotPrice2 != 0) { sM("You don't have enough coins."); } if(TotPrice2 <= 1) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); } if (TotPrice2 <= 0) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { addItem(itemID, amount); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); } } else if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), TotPrice2); addItem(itemID, amount); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= amount; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); } } else { sM("You don't have enough coins.");

Its 317 deltabase
